Package yacx

Class CProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • yacx.JNIHandle
      • yacx.CProgram
  • public class CProgram
extends JNIHandle
    Class to compile and execute a C-Program.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static CProgram create​(java.lang.String cProgram,
                              java.lang.String functionName,
                              java.lang.String[] parameterTypes)
        Compile a load c cProgram.
        The decleration of structs, functions or variables with one of the following name within passed C-Code is permitted:
        op, opfn, execute
        Parameters:
        cProgram - string containing the cProgram
        functionName - name of the cFunction which should be executed
        parameterTypes - types of parameter e.g. int or float*
        pointer types can be abbreviated by *
        Returns:
        created and compiled cProgram

      • create

        public static CProgram create​(java.lang.String cProgram,
                              java.lang.String functionName,
                              java.lang.String[] parameterTypes,
                              java.lang.String compiler)
        Compile a load c cProgram.
        The decleration of structs, functions or variables with one of the following name within passed C-Code is permitted:
        op, opfn, execute
        Parameters:
        cProgram - string containing the cProgram
        functionName - name of the cFunction which should be executed
        parameterTypes - types of parameter e.g. int or float*
        pointer types can be abbreviated by *
        compiler - name of the compiler for compiling the cProgram
        Returns:
        created and compiled cProgram

      • create

        public static CProgram create​(java.lang.String cProgram,
                              java.lang.String functionName,
                              java.lang.String[] parameterTypes,
                              java.lang.String compiler,
                              Options options)
        Compile a load c cProgram.
        The decleration of structs, functions or variables with one of the following name within passed C-Code is permitted:
        op, opfn, execute
        Parameters:
        cProgram - string containing the cProgram
        functionName - name of the cFunction which should be executed
        parameterTypes - types of parameter e.g. int or float*
        pointer types can be abbreviated by *
        compiler - name of the compiler for compiling the cProgram
        options - options for the passed compiler
        Returns:
        created and compiled cProgram

      • getTypes

        public static java.lang.String[] getTypes​(KernelArg[] args)
        Return the Ctypes of the passed array of KernelArgs.
        Parameters:
        args - kernelArgs
        Returns:
        array with corresponding Ctypes

      • execute

        public void execute​(KernelArg... args)
        Execute this cProgram.
        The upload and download options of ArrayArgs will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        args - arguments for function
